attributes.action: TICKET CONTROL ON COMPANIES SELLING THEM AT `SILLY` PRICES.
attributes.additional_details: WE THE UNDERSIGNED WANT `LAWS` TO CONTROL THE PRICE OF `TICKETS` SAY TO 20% OVER THERE FACE VALUE AND NOT `HUNDREDS` OF POUNDS AS AT THIS TIME, THIS `RIPS` OFF YOUNG `FANS` AND THE ONES WITH LESS MONEY BY STOPPING THEM GOING, AT THIS TIME VENUES SELL BLOCKS TO THESE COMPANIES TO RIP OFF THE FANS AS IN `DISPATCHES` TV PROGRAM WHERE THEY ADMIT BUYING LARGE AMOUNTS OF TICKETS WITH MANY ADDRESSES AND CREDIT CARDS, THIS MAKES IT VERY HARD FOR NORMAL PEOPLE TO GET ANY AT THE PRICE ON THE TICKET, THESE COMPANIES ARE MAKING VERY LARGE AMOUNTS OF MONEY IN MANY CASES FROM THE `POOR` , THIS SHOULD NOT BE ALLOWED TO HAPPEN AND AS ABOVE A `MAX` PUT ON OVER THE TICKET PRICES, AN MP IS FIGHTING THIS AT THIS TIME AND NEEDS THE BACKING FROM THE PUBLIC TO MAKE THINGS FAIR. SHOULD BE ENFORCED.
